title: Match the cyber threat to it's description.

_items.text: Cyber Criminals commit cyber-crime to...

_options.text: cause mayhem and push an agenda.
for recognition to show off their skills.
cripple entire industries or even countries.

_items.text: Hacktivists commit cyber-crime to...

_options.text: cause mayhem and push an agenda.
gain recognition and show off their skills.

_items.text: Glory Seekers commit cyber-crime to...

_options.text: cause mayhem and push an agenda.
gain recognition and show off their skills.

_items.text: Nation State Affiliates commit cyber crime to...

_options.text: cause mayhem and push an agenda.
gain recognition and show off their skills.

_incorrect.final:
That's incorrect.;

 

  • Cyber Criminals steal money.
  • Hacktivists cause mayhem and push an agenda
  • Glory seekers look for recognition of their skills
  • Nation State Affiliates may look to cripple industries and entire countries.

title: True or False: "North Tyneside Council is under cyber-attack 24/7"
displayTitle: True or False: "North Tyneside Council is under cyber-attack 24/7"

_items.text: True
False

_feedback.correct:
It's True!

North Tyneside Council is under cyber-attack, all day, every day.

IT works very hard to keep our information safe and secure from these attacks.

_incorrect.final:
It's True!

It's true that North Tyneside Council is under cyber-attack, all day, every day.

 

IT works very hard to keep our information safe and secure from these attacks.

title: Fill in the blanks
textBlock:
The biggest threat to North Tyneside Council's systems' security is %?%.

That's why cyber security is %?% responsibility.

_items.text: The Generic Data Pass Rules
The General Data Protection Regulation
The Genuine Data Protocol Registration

_feedback.correct:
That's correct!

The General Data Protection Regulation is a European data protection law that gives individuals more control over their personal information and businesses specific rules on how to handle that data.

_incorrect.final:
That's incorrect.

It stands for:
The General Data Protection Regulation,
 a European data protection law that gives individuals more control over their personal information and businesses specific rules on how to handle that data.

title: Health, sex life, criminal behaviour, race, ethnicity, religious beliefs, political opinions and trade union membership are all special pieces of personal data. What are they called?
displayTitle: Health, sex life, criminal behaviour, race, ethnicity, religious beliefs, political opinions and trade union membership are all special pieces of personal data. What are they called?

_items.text: Sensitive Data
_items.feedback:
That's right, these are all examples of sensitive data. 


Sensitive data needs extra protection.

_items.text: Unique Data
Trusted Data
Malicious Data

_feedback.correct:
That's right!

That's right, these are all examples of sensitive data.  Sensitive data needs extra protection.

_incorrect.final:
That's incorrect.

these are all examples of sensitive data.  Sensitive data needs extra protection.

title: Graphical Multiple Choice Question
body:
You've been asked by your boss to design a survey to find out who is using a North Tyneside Council office carpark and what they are using it for.

 

Which of the questionnaires below would be most appropriate to use?

_graphic.alt: A survey with questions: Name, Company, Car Registration, Purpose Of Visit
A survey with questions: Name, Company, Car Registration, Purpose Of Visit, Religion

_feedback.correct:
That's correct!

We should only collect the minimum amount of data we require, for the purpose we are collecting it for.

_incorrect.final:
That's incorrect.

That survey is collecting more data that is needed.
We should only collect the minimum amount of data we require, for the purpose we are collecting it for.

_graphic.alt: Passport Infomation
Football Scores
Dental Records
National Insurance Number
Favourite Colour
Date Of Birth
Weather Forecast
Address
Photograph

title: You believe you may have mixed up two customers and sent them both the other person's data. What is your best course of action?
displayTitle: You believe you may have mixed up two customers and sent them both the other person's data. What is your best course of action?

_items.text: Ask for them to send the data back immediately.
Contact Information Governance as soon as possible.
_items.feedback:
Correct, 

Information Governance should be contacted if you suspect a data breech.

They can be reached via email:
infomation.governance@northtyneside.gov.uk

_items.text: Wait for the customer's to realise the mistake.
Send the correct information as soon as you realise the mistake.

title: Guy with requests
body:
One of our customers contacts you and has a number of requests. 

Click or tap on the requests that we are legally required to assist them with.

_partlyCorrect.final:
You're partially correct. 

We must comply with all of these requests, except from giving them access to someone else's data. They have no legal right to that data.

_incorrect.final:
That's incorrect.  

We must comply with all of these requests, except from giving them access to someone else's data. They have no legal right to that data.

_feedback.correct:
That's right. 

We must comply with all of these requests, except from giving them access to someone else's data. They have no legal right to that data.

title: Why should you be concerned about this message from a friend on social media?
displayTitle: Why should you be concerned about this message from a friend on social media?

_items.text: You may not be able to make the payment in time.
Your friend's profile may have been hacked.
_items.feedback:
Correct, 
 

Your friend's profile may have been compromised, this could be a cyber criminal impersonating them so that you will send them money.

_items.text: Your friend is in trouble
Sending payment information is a security risk.

_feedback.correct:
Correct. 

You can't be sure that other people's profiles are secure and haven't been compromised.

If in doubt, call your friend or speak to them in person. Make sure that it's them.

_incorrect.final: Incorrect. You can't be sure that other people's profiles are secure and haven't been compromised. If in doubt, call your friend or speak to them in person. Make sure that it's them.

_items.feedback: That's right. This will automatically connect you to the VPN, ensuring that your connection is secure and safe.
That's incorrect. This doesn't connect you to the VPN, so your laptop is vulnerable, anyone could be looking at what you are doing via the coffee shop wifi

_feedback.correct:
That's correct!
 

This icon connects us to the VPN, ensuring that no one else can snoop at what you are doing via the coffee shop wifi.

_incorrect.final:
That's incorrect.
This icon does not connect us to the VPN, cyber criminals could snoop at what you are doing via the coffee shop wifi.

title: Password Stacker
instruction: Order the passwords below. (strongest at the top, weakest at the bottom)

_feedback.correct:
That's correct!

RZH$#DcbSh117q
This is a very strong password, long and random!

pretty.teapot.ball

This is quite a strong password, it's long, and none of the words relate to each other or you.

 

Newcastle.D@vid

Although this password is long, it is made up of easily guessable information (the person's name and home city)

Mavis13

This password is very weak, it's short and easily guessable. (It's likely Mavis' 13th password...)

_incorrect.final:
That's incorrect. 

RZH$#DcbSh117q 
This is a very strong password, long and random! 

pretty.teapot.ball

This is quite a strong password, it's long, and none of the words relate to each other or you.

 

Newcastle.D@vid

Although this password is long, it is made up of easily guessable information (the person's name and home city) 

Mavis13

This password is very weak, it's short and easily guessable. (It's likely Mavis' 13th password...)

_partlyCorrect.final:
That's not quite right. 

RZH$#DcbSh117q 
This is a very strong password, long and random! 

pretty.teapot.ball

This is quite a strong password, it's long, and none of the words relate to each other or you.

 

Newcastle.D@vid

Although this password is long, it is made up of easily guessable information (the person's name and home city) 

Mavis13

This password is very weak, it's short and easily guessable. (It's likely Mavis' 13th password...)

title: "Do"s and "Don't"s
body:
There are rules and practices around keeping our passwords and systems as securely as possible. 

Select "Do" or "Don't" for the following practices.

_graphic.alt: Use A Different Password For Each System

_images.feedback: Passwords are like keys. You should have a different one for each door (system).

_graphic.alt: Log Out Of Systems When Finished

_images.feedback: This avoids the next user of the device having access to your account.

_graphic.alt: Make Passwords Long

_images.feedback: Long passwords are strong passwords. The longer, the better.

_graphic.alt: Change Passwords Regularly

_images.feedback: Change passwords often, especially if you suspect it is compromised.

_graphic.alt: Use Personal Information In Your Passwords

_images.feedback: Personal Information is easily guessed when trying to hack a password.

_graphic.alt: Use repeating or sequences of characters.

_images.feedback: Computers used for hacking, can test these patterns very easily. Random is best.
Passwords that are written down can be easily found. read and used by hackers and cyber criminals.

_graphic.alt: Share your password and accounts with others.

_images.feedback: You are responsible for your passwords and accounts. Only you should have access to them.

_graphic.alt: Add a number to an old password.

_images.feedback: Adding a number to a compromised or old password, does not make it any stronger/ harder to crack.

title: Multiple Choice Question
body:
The best rule for keeping yourself safe online is to keep any eye out for anything that "JDLR".
But what does JDLR stand for?

_items.text: Just Doesn't Look Right
Justified Direct Length Regulation
Just Denies Looking Real
Jargon Displayed with Lower Regularity

title: Multiple Choice Question
body:
Social media can be an excellent resource for hackers and cyber criminals.

Social media is full of information that can allow them to impersonate and convince you and others of their legitimacy.
instruction: What information is likely to be found on an unsecure social media profile? Select all that apply.

_items.text: Name
Age
Friends
Location
Employer

_feedback.correct: Correct, these are all pieces of information that can be mined and used by hackers and cyber criminals.

_incorrect.final: Incorrect, these are all pieces of information that can be mined and used by hackers and cyber criminals.

_partlyCorrect.final: Not quite, these are all pieces of information that can be mined and used by hackers and cyber criminals.
_partlyCorrect.notFinal: You're partially correct, but there are more correct answers. Try Again.

title: Fill in the Blanks
textBlock:
The setting's that control who can see the information on your social media profile is called the %?% settings.

 

It is a good idea to only allow your %?% to see your information and posts.

 

Allowing %?% to access your information could lead to them using that information to perform phishing scams.

title: Question Text
body:
You have a work laptop and you need to access your work emails from a local coffee shop. 

Which icon should you select when you come to log into the laptop?

title: Which sentence best describes a virtual private network (VPN)
displayTitle: Which sentence best describes a virtual private network (VPN)

_items.text: A secure connection from your laptop to the internet, that can be managed and secured by the IT team.
A slower connection to the internet that doesn't need a Wifi connection.
A way to connect to other computers within North Tyneside while you're out and about.

_feedback.correct:
Correct!

The VPN makes sure that you, and only you, can see what you are doing online. It makes sure that cyber criminals can't get access to your .

_incorrect.final:
Incorrect.

 

The VPN makes sure that you, and only you, can see what you are doing online. It makes sure that cyber criminals can't get access to your .
